wordGroup: environmentally friendly 保护生态环境的；对生态环境无害的
environmentally sound 对环境无害的
environmentally sensitive 环境易受破坏的；环境警觉的

sentences.en: Young people are very environmentally aware.
sentences.cn: 年轻人的环保意识很强。

sentences.en: Our brochure is printed on environmentally-friendly paper.
sentences.cn: 我们的宣传手册是用环保纸印刷的。
